title: getOneMetaDataJSONSchema
description: Schema representing the metadata associated with objects

objectType.description: Type of object stored. Higher level than mediaType.

dateCreated.description: Date representing when object has been initialy created.

dateUploaded.description: Date representing when the associated object got successfully uploaded. Automaticaly set.

createdBy.description: Reference to the person who created the object.

uploadedBy.description: Reference to the person who uploaded the object.

hash.description: Hash of the uploaded object. Automaticaly generated on successful file upload.

managedAttributes.description: List of key/value pairs of managed attributes.

unmanagedAttributes.description: List of key/value pairs of unmanaged attributes.
